## LoadingProgressIndicatorProps.shouldFocusOnFirstTick property

Should the loading indicator be focussed on the first tick? (default: false).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
shouldFocusOnFirstTick?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

This is likely not the ideal screen reader interaction, but will give the user feedback about what’s happening. Otherwise they’ll click a link and have no indication anything’s happening.

This may be replaced with an ARIA live regions announcement in a future release.
